entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Oxtongue Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:26 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 8:00 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
Temperature: 6.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 6.0°C
Wind: WSW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle early this evening. Periods of rain beginning early this evening. Fog patches. Amount 5 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 mm. High plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
